Yup so I have had school all week...

today wasnt nething new...except i didn't get a hug especially when i needed one...i was really sad today...some people know some dont...but that person didnt give me a hug which i really dont care if they do or not it is just the fact that i needed one but i got some from others...so i dont care that u didnt give me a hug or not it was just stupid of u to tell me u were and u didnt.

so im home its 8 and im still kind of sad. But not at the reason why i was when i was in school its all better now

but im still sad. for a different reason. i need to talk to justyna or something. becuase she is the only one who listens to me. well there are other people who do but she really listens to me and idk.

but whatever...right now im watching the laguna beach marathon.
and talking to a jerk

Update on week


May 5th- My birthday!! and i had so many cards...and money...in spanish elise and molly made me blow out candles in front of everyone and freaking everyone sang to me...it was also cinco de mayo...yeah i got a balloon from jess...wow i had a really god birthday...i got my ipod...thank you everyone

May 6th- friday wow couldnt wait to get school over with yeah so teresa and jess came over for pizza and cake we had fun...teresa and i watched saw while jess fell asleep and ya if u had seen what we did u wouldve like laughed at us sooo hard...

May7th- Saturday we went watched the forgotten then went for a walk in the woods some funny shit happened...then yeah...they went home at 5 then i slept and slept then went online and talked things out with some people...then talk with other people

now today is the 8th of may and its sunday i have school tomorrow i went and bought some eyeliner and cover up needed it...and im updating and soon i have to start my homework...only math and spanish i think...nothing else...hopefully...if i dont then ill find it off someone

yeah

yeah so thursday i got picked up from school from mr noble and slept over martines house...yeah we were bored so we mad a boy hottie list yeah if  you want to know what u got for the scale just IM me...then we watched so stuff on tv...then went to bed...

FRIDAY MORNING- YEAH SO WHEN ALL YOU BITCHESS WERE ON A BUS martine and i were sleeping..then we got woking up by her mom calling...then we couldnt go back to bed...and im like the only way i am gonna wake up is if i take a shower...then im like NO i want to get into the jacuzzi bath she is like ok then im like i want bubbles so martine put bubbles in then turned on the jets...yea we like walked in and bubbles were every where around the room funny...then so martine came in and drained it then she hopped into the shower and went i went to re-fill the thing no hot water so martine and i had to wait a half and hour...then yeah i took a shower...then martine did my hair and then we walked to mcdonalds...as martine went into the play place i sat and laughed at her...then we walked home and stole flowers from other peoples yard...then we got ready for the mall...

FRIDAY NIGHT- OMG ally came with us ♥ i love her...i saw chels she is amazzzzzing and elise  she is a cute pah-tutie and JESS B wow i love that girl till the end...♥ alot... YAYA and all these other people it was fun...haha popa and i had fun at the end...

yeah ill update later.

♥ alyssa

Because you're my Best Friend..(this was off a website i am not that good of a poet)

When you are sad,
I will dry your tears.
When you are scared,
I will comfort your fears.
When you are worried,
I will give you hope.
When you are confused,
I will help you cope.
And when you are lost,
And can't see the light.
I shall be your beacon
Shining ever so bright
This is my oath.
I pledge till the end.
Why you may ask?
Because your my friend.  

~****another poem from internet****~

you'r my friend and that is true,
but the gift was given from me to you.
we went thru moments that were good and bad,
even moments that were happy and sad.
you suported me when i was in tears,
we stuck together when we were in fear,

its really sad that it had to be this way,
but it has reached its very last day.
miles away cant keep us apart,
'cause you'll always be in my heart.


~****ok one more from the internet****~

My Friend

My Friend when I think of you.
I think of all that we've been through.
All the times we argue and fight,
I know deep inside that it isn't right.
I, then feel bad and alot of pain.
It feels like I've fallen from the sky like the rain.
I love you dear friend with all of my heart.
But now that you're gone I've fallen apart.
I'm getting better as the days go by.
I wish sometimes this was all a big lie.
I pray to you every night.
It's like you're my fire, a burning light. 
My dear friend, I miss you alot.
I still wonder why you were put in that spot.
I know you're in a place much better than here. 
Watching and helping me with all of my fear.
Our friendship my dear friend,
we will have to the end.
Friends til the end is what we will be.
Someday we'll be together,
together you and me.

Submitted By: Rashmi

This weekend was GREAT 

friday-
teresa came over around 5 and we sat and talked then started to clean my room...somewhat...then at like 6:15 we started to get ready...teresa did everything like my clothes make-up and hair...then we went to the Battle of the Bands...which we had alot of fun...especially teresa she was like sooooo into it....i saw my amors♥ elise, bong (veronica) chels, megan g, jess, mia, mo, jen, and alot more...then we went outside when it was done and jess used my phone i hung out with my amors ♥including teresa...then i guess my phone was ringing and it is on vibrate and high ringer and it was in my pocket and here jess is standing like about 2 ft away goin alyssa your phone is ringing yea...it was strange...then teresa and i got picked up we picked up my sister and macy at erics...then we went home...and teresa and i tried to do my voice mail on my phone but everytime we went to go do it we were laughin so hard that we couldnt breathe it took us about 20 times to actually get it right...then around 1 we went to bed

Saturday-
I woke up...then teresa woke up...then we just talked about our day and decided that im going home with teresa to spend the day at her house...it was fun...we tried calling someone like 208319283109 times...never picked up then when megan g called they picked up but their mother was on the phone...so around 5 we went to megan's house...it was fun we were just about laughin the whole time...yes best saturday yet to come...to "ow ow, MEGAN WHY IS IT BURNING?!?!" to "AHHHHHH SHIT AHHHHH SHIT AHHHH SHIT FUCK I SPILT THE PIZZa" (on a nice white rug) to slapping eachother to tag to falling to like everything we had fun...i went home at midnight...but that is ok teresa and i had a great two days spending and talking about alot of stuff because usually someone is near us so we dont get to have our "private talks" so yea we talked and going to megans house was like sooo fun...

yea so that is my weekend and here it is sunday and i am updating

WHOA feild trip sucked alot....but the bus was sooo much fun especially on the way home hahaha...whoa yea i had fun but on the way there i got so many gummie bears adn skittles and licorice (however u spell that according to a anonymous person that is how) at me! and same on the way home but i sat in the way back so it was hard for people to throw them at me....yea i brought my phone called jess<333 in the morning i woke her up sorry about that!!! then like called mo on the way back and she didnt pick up then she called me!!! and yea i had no money left so i had to hang up!! sorry!!! hmmmmm my stupid cd player wouldnt work...yea i brought my cell phone and it ended up me not having it and it went up adn down the isle and letting everyone use it i didnt even know who had it but i know max had it the most. then anthony changed the greeting to AnThony is hot. yea i changed it back to alyssa... and max went into the bathroom christa stealing his seat max taking my phone and sitting in the bathroom as a seat and played black jack on my phone...the girls liked the rhinestones on the phone...ummmm the lowell trip was soooo  boring....all we did was weave which was like wicked wicked easy...watching the guys do it was really funny. I also stole anthonys neckalace for like 10 mintues and it was his broken one and he said i couldnt latch it but my first attempt i did it so haha...yea so the bus ride was so much better then the feild trip...but my group was good i had up to ABBIE in it! yea i will have to say it was the best bus ride

I havent updated in a while well i am really really really sick! i dont like being sick but whatever i stayed home from school today so that was ok even though ive been absent alot...i dont like being sick at all...i feel like im gonna die...stuffed up nose...sore throat....headaches...weak...i dont like this well im gonna go rest.

but yesterday which was friday i went to the mall with marissa<3 and we had fun we shopped and stuff then i saw martine ally and dave and skippy and mike and matt and that was good...i didnt really talk to them....marissa and i truied on deb dresses at the end of the night taht was a blast....

now today is saturday and im really bored someone call so we can hang out!!!!

Yea i havent updated this in a while becuase the livejournal was down but its up finally...

wow not much but alot has happened...

recap of it all...

the 10th of january...nothing special i had school then after school i had a practice for basketball that went all good...

the 11th: I didnt end up goin to school because i had a dentist appointment i got there and they ddint have me scheduled in becuase this dumb person did and yea we only made a big deal out of it was because my dentist is all the way it Conneticut so that was bad...

the 12th: i didnt end up going to school because i got really sick so i stayed the whole time in bed and played Spyro...then it got shut off so i had to re-start it all over again...

the 13th: i didnt end up going to school again because i still was really sick and my dad wanted me to stay home so i was playing spyro becuase there is nothing else u can do when u are sick i could be watched tv but all that was on was dora the explorer and those gay children shows  except for mtv they had shows but i already saw them all..

the 14th: ahhh i went to school today fine untill lunch...not gonna say nething about it...lets just say everything got all messed up...i went to the dance that was good...

today: nothing much was around the house talked online untill my basketball game we won 29-20 yea i made 4 baskets...yea now i am home updating...

comment<3
